item.title: CV
item.description: Summary An experienced data scientist with a diverse background and a strong technical skill set, I have experience working both internationally and domestically in industries such as development, telecommunications, government and finance. Currently working in management consulting, Iâ€™m enjoying exploring data engineering, theoretical statistics and arduino at the moment. Education Doctor of Philosophy 2004-2008 Research focused on finding practical, but theoretically robust solutions for testing complex time series models over multiple dimensions (panel data).
